name: The Mission
description: Ever since the corporations took control of District 5, things started to get ugly. Toxic chemicals from nearby power plants have infiltrated the water supply, causing irreparable damage. First, it was the skin rash. Then it was inexplicable bleeding and bruising. Eventually, people began to go crazy and kill without discernment.  After the quarantine, they decided to send ME to investigate and capture one of the mutants. Sure, everybody knows the Silver Raven always get the job done, but this is starting to feel like a deathtrap....
